name: AttributeInput
description: Specifies the input fields required for an attribute.

inputFields.name: key
inputFields.description: Key or name of the attribute.

inputFields.name: value
inputFields.description: Value of the attribute.

name: RefundLineItemInput
description: Specifies the fields required to return line items on a refund.

inputFields.name: lineItemId
inputFields.description: The ID of the line item in the refund.

inputFields.name: quantity
inputFields.description: The quantity of the associated line item that was returned.

inputFields.name: restockType
inputFields.description: The type of restock for this line item.

inputFields.name: locationId
inputFields.description: The intended location for restocking if `refundType` is not `NO_RESTOCK`

name: ShippingRefundInput
description: Specifies the fields required to return shipping costs on a Refund.

inputFields.name: amount
inputFields.description: The monetary value of the shipping fees to be returned.

inputFields.name: fullRefund
inputFields.description: Whether a full refund is provided.

name: OrderTransactionInput
description: Specifies the information needed to create an order transaction.

inputFields.name: amount
inputFields.description: The amount of money for this transaction.

inputFields.name: gateway
inputFields.description: The payment gateway to use for this transaction.

inputFields.name: kind
inputFields.description: The kind of transaction.

inputFields.name: orderId
inputFields.description: The ID of the order associated with the transaction.

inputFields.name: parentId
inputFields.description: The ID of the optional parent transaction, for example the authorization of a capture.

name: MailingAddressInput
description: The fields used to create or update a mailing address.

inputFields.name: address1
inputFields.description: The first line of the address. Typically the street address or PO Box number.

inputFields.name: address2
inputFields.description: The second line of the address. Typically the number of the apartment, suite, or unit.

inputFields.name: city
inputFields.description: The name of the city, district, village, or town.

inputFields.name: company
inputFields.description: The name of the customer's company or organization.

inputFields.name: country
inputFields.description: The name of the country. This argument is deprecated: Use `countryCode` instead.

inputFields.name: countryCode
inputFields.description: The two-letter code for the country of the address.

inputFields.name: firstName
inputFields.description: The first name of the customer.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: This argument is deprecated: Not needed for 90% of mutations, and provided separately where it is needed.

inputFields.name: lastName
inputFields.description: The last name of the customer.

inputFields.name: phone
inputFields.description:
A unique phone number for the customer.

Formatted using E.164 standard. For example, _+16135551111_.

inputFields.name: province
inputFields.description: The region of the address, such as the province, state, or district. This argument is deprecated: Use `provinceCode` instead.

inputFields.name: provinceCode
inputFields.description:
The code for the region of the address, such as the province, state, or district.
For example QC for Quebec, Canada.

inputFields.name: zip
inputFields.description: The zip or postal code of the address.

name: MoneyInput
description: Specifies the fields for a monetary value with currency.

inputFields.name: amount
inputFields.description: Decimal money amount.

inputFields.name: currencyCode
inputFields.description: Currency of the money.

name: AppInstallInput
description: Fields required to install an app.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The ID for the channel API client to be installed.

name: AppSubscriptionLineItemInput
description: Allows an app to add more than one plan to an app subscription.

inputFields.name: plan
inputFields.description: Defines the pricing model for the app subscription.

name: AppPlanInput
description: Defines the pricing model for the app subscription.

inputFields.name: appUsagePricingDetails
inputFields.description: Usage based billing pricing details.

inputFields.name: appRecurringPricingDetails
inputFields.description: Recurring based billing pricing details.

name: AppUsagePricingInput
description: Allows an app to charge a store for usage.

inputFields.name: cappedAmount
inputFields.description: The limit a customer can be charged for usage based pricing.

inputFields.name: terms
inputFields.description: The terms and conditions for app usage.

name: AppRecurringPricingInput
description: Allows an app to charge per billing interval.

inputFields.name: price
inputFields.description: The amount to be charged to the store every billing interval. The only permitted currency code is USD.

name: AppUninstallInput
description: Input fields used to uninstall an app.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The id for the app api client to be uninstalled.

inputFields.name: feedback
inputFields.description: Reason selected from a list of predefined reasons for uninstalling the app.

inputFields.name: feedbackDescription
inputFields.description:
Free form text description for uninstalling the app.
              To be provided only when feedback has been provided.

inputFields.name: extraAttributes
inputFields.description: Additional attributes to pass along during app installation.

name: CollectionInput
description: Specifies the input fields required to create a collection.

inputFields.name: descriptionHtml
inputFields.description: The description of the collection, in HTML format.

inputFields.name: handle
inputFields.description: A unique human-friendly string for the collection. Automatically generated from the collection's title.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Specifies the collection to update or create a new collection if absent.

inputFields.name: image
inputFields.description: The image associated with the collection.

inputFields.name: products
inputFields.description: Initial list of collection products. Only valid with `productCreate` and without rules.

inputFields.name: publications
inputFields.description: Initial list of collection publications. Only valid with `productCreate`. This argument is deprecated: Use PublishablePublish instead.

inputFields.name: privateMetafields
inputFields.description: The private metafields to associated with this product.

inputFields.name: ruleSet
inputFields.description: The rules used to assign products to the collection.

inputFields.name: templateSuffix
inputFields.description: The theme template used when viewing the collection in a store.

inputFields.name: sortOrder
inputFields.description: The order in which the collection's products are sorted.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Required for creating a new collection.

inputFields.name: metafields
inputFields.description: The metafields to associate with this collection.

inputFields.name: seo
inputFields.description: SEO information for the collection.

inputFields.name: redirectNewHandle
inputFields.description:
Indicates whether a redirect is required after a new handle has been provided.
If true, then the old handle is redirected to the new one automatically.

name: ImageInput
description: Specifies the input fields for an image.

inputFields.name: src
inputFields.description: The URL of the image. May be a signed upload URL.

name: CollectionPublicationInput
description: Specifies the publications to which a collection will be published.

inputFields.name: publicationId
inputFields.description: The ID of the publication.

inputFields.name: channelId
inputFields.description: The ID of the channel. This argument is deprecated: Use publicationId instead.

inputFields.name: channelHandle
inputFields.description: This argument is deprecated: Use publicationId instead.

name: PrivateMetafieldInput
description: Specifies the input fields for a PrivateMetafield.

inputFields.name: owner
inputFields.description: The owning resource.

inputFields.name: namespace
inputFields.description: The namespace for the private metafield.

inputFields.name: key
inputFields.description: The key for the private metafield.

inputFields.name: valueInput
inputFields.description: The value and value type of the metafield, wrapped in a ValueInput object.

name: PrivateMetafieldValueInput
description: Value Input wraps two fields of Private Metafields into one. Those fields are value and value_type.

inputFields.name: value
inputFields.description: The value of a private metafield.

inputFields.name: valueType
inputFields.description: Represents the private metafield value type.

name: CollectionRuleSetInput
description: Specifies a rule set for the collection.

inputFields.name: appliedDisjunctively
inputFields.description:
Whether products must match any or all of the rules to be included in the collection.
If true, then products must match one or more of the rules to be included in the collection.
If false, then products must match all of the rules to be included in the collection.

inputFields.name: rules
inputFields.description: The rules used to assign products to the collection.

name: CollectionRuleInput
description: Specifies a rule to associate with a collection.

inputFields.name: column
inputFields.description: The attribute that the rule focuses on (for example, `title` or `product_type`).

inputFields.name: relation
inputFields.description: The type of operator that the rule is based on (for example, `equals`, `contains`, or `not_equals`).

inputFields.name: condition
inputFields.description: The value that the operator is applied to (for example, `Hats`).

name: MetafieldInput
description: Specifies the input fields for a metafield.

name: SEOInput
description: SEO information.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: SEO title of the product.

inputFields.name: description
inputFields.description: SEO description of the product.

name: CollectionDeleteInput
description: Specifies the collection to delete.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The ID of the collection to be deleted.

name: CollectionPublishInput
description: Specifies a collection to publish and the sales channels to publish it to.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The collection to create or update publications for.

inputFields.name: collectionPublications
inputFields.description: The channels where the collection will be published.

name: CollectionUnpublishInput
description: Specifies the collection to unpublish and the sales channels to remove it from.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The collection to create or update publications for.

inputFields.name: collectionPublications
inputFields.description: The channels where the collection is published.

name: MoveInput
description: An individual move to perform of an object to a position.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The ID of the object to be moved.

inputFields.name: newPosition
inputFields.description: The new position of the object in the set, using a 0 based index.

name: CustomFulfillmentServiceCreateInput
description: The input fields used to create a custom fulfillment service.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: The name of the fulfillment service.

inputFields.name: email
inputFields.description:
The address to which an email is sent when the custom fulfillment service
receives a fulfill request.

name: WeightInput
description: Specifies the weight unit and value inputs.

inputFields.name: value
inputFields.description: The weight value using the unit system specified with `weight_unit`.

inputFields.name: unit
inputFields.description: Unit of measurement for `value`.

name: CustomerInput
description: Provides the fields and values to use when creating or updating a customer.

inputFields.name: acceptsMarketing
inputFields.description: Whether the customer has consented to receive marketing material via email.

inputFields.name: acceptsMarketingUpdatedAt
inputFields.description:
The date and time when the customer consented or objected to receiving marketing material by email. Set
whenever the customer consents or objects to marketing material.

inputFields.name: addresses
inputFields.description: An input that specifies addresses for a customer.

inputFields.name: email
inputFields.description: The unique email address of the customer.

inputFields.name: firstName
inputFields.description: The customer's first name.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Specifies the customer to update, or creates a new customer if one doesn't exist.

inputFields.name: lastName
inputFields.description: The customer's last name.

inputFields.name: marketingOptInLevel
inputFields.description:
The marketing subscription opt-in level (as described by the M3AAWG best practices guideline) that was
enabled when the customer consented to receiving marketing material by email.

inputFields.name: metafields
inputFields.description: Attaches additional metadata to the customer.

inputFields.name: note
inputFields.description: A note about the customer.

inputFields.name: phone
inputFields.description: The unique phone number for the customer.

inputFields.name: privateMetafields
inputFields.description: The private metafields to associated with this product.

inputFields.name: tags
inputFields.description: Tags that the shop owner has attached to the customer.

inputFields.name: taxExempt
inputFields.description: Whether the customer is exempt from paying taxes on their order.

inputFields.name: taxExemptions
inputFields.description: The list of tax exemptions to apply to the customer.

name: CustomerDeleteInput
description: Specifies the customer to delete.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The ID of the customer to delete.

name: EmailInput
description: Specifies the fields for an email.

inputFields.name: subject
inputFields.description: Specifies the email subject.

inputFields.name: to
inputFields.description: Specifies the email recipient.

inputFields.name: from
inputFields.description: Specifies the email sender.

inputFields.name: body
inputFields.description: Specifies the email body.

inputFields.name: bcc
inputFields.description: Specifies any bcc recipients for the email.

inputFields.name: customMessage
inputFields.description: Specifies a custom message to include in the email.

name: DeliveryProfileInput
description: Input fields for a delivery profile.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: The name of the profile.

inputFields.name: profileLocationGroups
inputFields.description: The location groups associated with the profile.

inputFields.name: locationGroupsToCreate
inputFields.description: The location groups to be created in the profile.

inputFields.name: locationGroupsToUpdate
inputFields.description: The location groups to be updated in the profile.

inputFields.name: locationGroupsToDelete
inputFields.description: The location groups to be deleted in the profile.

inputFields.name: variantsToAssociate
inputFields.description: The product variant ids to be associated with this profile.

inputFields.name: variantsToDissociate
inputFields.description: The product variant ids to be dissociated from this profile and returned to the default profile.

inputFields.name: zonesToDelete
inputFields.description: Zones to delete.

inputFields.name: methodDefinitionsToDelete
inputFields.description: Method definitions to delete.

inputFields.name: conditionsToDelete
inputFields.description: Conditions to delete.

name: DeliveryProfileLocationGroupInput
description: Input fields for a delivery location group associated to a profile.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Globally unique identifier of the LocationGroup.

inputFields.name: locations
inputFields.description: The location ids of the locations to be moved to this location group.

inputFields.name: zonesToCreate
inputFields.description: Zones to create.

inputFields.name: zonesToUpdate
inputFields.description: Zones to update.

name: DeliveryLocationGroupZoneInput
description: Input fields for a delivery zone associated to a location group and profile.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Globally unique identifier of the Zone.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: The name of the zone.

inputFields.name: countries
inputFields.description: Countries to associate with the zone.

inputFields.name: methodDefinitionsToCreate
inputFields.description: Method definitions to create.

inputFields.name: methodDefinitionsToUpdate
inputFields.description: Method definitions to update.

name: DeliveryCountryInput
description: Input fields to specify a country.

inputFields.name: code
inputFields.description: The country code of the country.

inputFields.name: restOfWorld
inputFields.description: Use Rest of World as the country.

inputFields.name: provinces
inputFields.description: The regions associated with this country.

inputFields.name: includeAllProvinces
inputFields.description: Associate all available provinces with this country.

name: DeliveryProvinceInput
description: The input fields to specify a region.

inputFields.name: code
inputFields.description: The code of the region.

name: DeliveryMethodDefinitionInput
description: Input fields for a method definition.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Globally unique identifier of the method definition. Use only when updating a method definiton.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: The name of the method definition.

inputFields.name: description
inputFields.description: The description of the method definition.

inputFields.name: active
inputFields.description: Whether or not to use this method definition during rate calculation.

inputFields.name: rateDefinition
inputFields.description: A rate definition to apply to the method definition.

inputFields.name: participant
inputFields.description: A participant to apply to the method definition.

inputFields.name: weightConditionsToCreate
inputFields.description: Weight conditions on the method definition.

inputFields.name: priceConditionsToCreate
inputFields.description: Price conditions on the method definition.

inputFields.name: conditionsToUpdate
inputFields.description: Conditions on the method definition to update.

name: DeliveryRateDefinitionInput
description: Input fields for a rate definition.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Globally unique identifier of the rate definition.

inputFields.name: price
inputFields.description: The price of the rate definition.

name: DeliveryParticipantInput
description: Input fields for a participant.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Globally unique identifier of the participant.

inputFields.name: carrierServiceId
inputFields.description: Global identifier of the carrier service.

inputFields.name: fixedFee
inputFields.description: The merchant-set fixed fee for this participant.

inputFields.name: percentageOfRateFee
inputFields.description: The merchant-set percentage-of-rate fee for this participant.

inputFields.name: participantServices
inputFields.description: Services offered by the participant and their active status.

inputFields.name: adaptToNewServices
inputFields.description: Flag to indicate if new available services should be included.

name: DeliveryParticipantServiceInput
description: Input fields for a service provided by a participant.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Name of the service.

inputFields.name: active
inputFields.description: If the service is active or not.

name: DeliveryWeightConditionInput
description: Input fields for the weight-based conditions of a method definition.

inputFields.name: criteria
inputFields.description: The criteria for the weight.

inputFields.name: operator
inputFields.description: The operator to use for comparison.

name: DeliveryPriceConditionInput
description: Input fields for the price-based conditions of a method definition.

inputFields.name: criteria
inputFields.description: The criteria for the price.

inputFields.name: operator
inputFields.description: The operator to use for comparison.

name: DeliveryUpdateConditionInput
description: Input fields for updating the conditions of a method definition.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Globally unique identifier of the condition.

inputFields.name: criteria
inputFields.description: The value of the criteria of the condition.

inputFields.name: criteriaUnit
inputFields.description: The unit of the criteria of the condition.

inputFields.name: field
inputFields.description: The field to use, either total_weight or total_price.

inputFields.name: operator
inputFields.description: The operator to use for comparison.

name: DeliverySettingInput
description: Input fields for shop-level delivery settings.

inputFields.name: legacyModeProfiles
inputFields.description: Enables legacy compatability mode for the multi-location delivery profiles feature.

name: MutationsDeviceAttributesReportInput
description: Device attributes to report.

inputFields.name: canvasFingerprint
inputFields.description: Canvas fingerprint.

inputFields.name: hasCookies
inputFields.description: Cookies.

inputFields.name: fonts
inputFields.description: Installed Fonts.

inputFields.name: lang
inputFields.description: Default language.

inputFields.name: hasLocalStorage
inputFields.description: Whether or not local storage is available.

inputFields.name: plugins
inputFields.description: Installed plugins.

inputFields.name: screen
inputFields.description: Screen information.

inputFields.name: hasSessionStorage
inputFields.description: Whether or not session storage is available.

inputFields.name: tzOffset
inputFields.description: Time zone offset.

inputFields.name: userAgent
inputFields.description: User Agent string.

name: DiscountAutomaticBxgyInput
description: Specifies input field to create or update automatic bogo discount.

inputFields.name: startsAt
inputFields.description: The date and time when the discount starts.

inputFields.name: endsAt
inputFields.description: The date and time when the discount ends. For open-ended discounts, use `null`.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: The title of the discount.

inputFields.name: usesPerOrderLimit
inputFields.description: The maximum number of times that the discount can be applied to an order.

inputFields.name: customerBuys
inputFields.description: The qualifying items and the quantity of each one that the customer has to buy to be eligible for the discount.

inputFields.name: customerGets
inputFields.description: The qualifying items in an order, the quantity of each one, and the total value of the discount.

name: DiscountCustomerBuysInput
description: Specifies the prerequisite items and prerequisite quantity.

inputFields.name: value
inputFields.description: The quantity of prerequisite items.

inputFields.name: items
inputFields.description: The IDs of items that the customer buys. The items can be either collections or products.

name: DiscountCustomerBuysValueInput
description: Specifies the prerequisite quantity for the discount.

inputFields.name: quantity
inputFields.description: The quantity of prerequisite items.

name: DiscountItemsInput
description: Specifies the items attached to a discount.

inputFields.name: products
inputFields.description: The products and product variants that are attached to a discount.

inputFields.name: collections
inputFields.description: The collections that are attached to a discount.

inputFields.name: all
inputFields.description: Whether all items should be selected.

name: DiscountProductsInput
description: Specifies the products and product variants attached to a discount.

inputFields.name: productsToAdd
inputFields.description: Specifies list of product ids to add.

inputFields.name: productsToRemove
inputFields.description: Specifies list of product ids to remove.

inputFields.name: productVariantsToAdd
inputFields.description: Specifies list of product variant ids to add.

inputFields.name: productVariantsToRemove
inputFields.description: Specifies list of product variant ids to remove.

name: DiscountCollectionsInput
description: Specifies the collections attached to a discount.

inputFields.name: add
inputFields.description: Specifies list of collection ids to add.

inputFields.name: remove
inputFields.description: Specifies list of collection ids to remove.

name: DiscountCustomerGetsInput
description: Specifies the items that will be discounted, the quantity of items that will be discounted, and the value of discount.

inputFields.name: value
inputFields.description: The quantity of items discounted and the discount value.

inputFields.name: items
inputFields.description: The IDs of the items that the customer gets. The items can be either collections or products.

name: DiscountCustomerGetsValueInput
description: Specifies the quantity of items discounted and the discount value.

inputFields.name: discountOnQuantity
inputFields.description: The quantity of the items that are discounted and the discount value.

inputFields.name: percentage
inputFields.description: The percentage value of the discount. Value must be between 0.00 - 1.00.

inputFields.name: discountAmount
inputFields.description: The value of the discount.

name: DiscountOnQuantityInput
description: Specifies the quantity of items discounted and the discount value.

inputFields.name: quantity
inputFields.description: The quantity of items that are discounted.

inputFields.name: effect
inputFields.description: The percentage value of the discount.

name: DiscountEffectInput
description: Specifies how the discount will be applied. Currently, only percentage off is supported.

inputFields.name: percentage
inputFields.description: The percentage value of the discount. Value must be between 0.00 - 1.00.

name: DiscountAmountInput
description: Specifies the value of the discount and how it is applied.

inputFields.name: amount
inputFields.description: The value of the discount.

inputFields.name: appliesOnEachItem
inputFields.description: If true, then the discount is applied to each of the entitled items. If false, then the amount is split across all of the entitled items.

name: DiscountAutomaticBasicInput
description: Specifies input field to create or update automatic basic discount.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: The title of the discount.

inputFields.name: startsAt
inputFields.description: The date and time when the discount starts.

inputFields.name: endsAt
inputFields.description: The date and time when the discount ends. For open-ended discounts, use `null`.

inputFields.name: minimumRequirement
inputFields.description: The minimum subtotal or quantity that's required for the discount to be applied.

inputFields.name: customerGets
inputFields.description: The qualifying items in an order, the quantity of each one, and the total value of the discount.

name: DiscountMinimumRequirementInput
description: Specifies the quantity or subtotal minimum requirements for a discount.

inputFields.name: quantity
inputFields.description: The minimum required quantity.

inputFields.name: subtotal
inputFields.description: The minimum required subtotal.

name: DiscountMinimumQuantityInput
description: Specifies the quantity minimum requirements for a discount.

inputFields.name: greaterThanOrEqualToQuantity
inputFields.description: The minimum quantity of items that's required for the discount to be applied.

name: DiscountMinimumSubtotalInput
description: Specifies the subtotal minimum requirements for a discount.

inputFields.name: greaterThanOrEqualToSubtotal
inputFields.description: The minimum subtotal that's required for the discount to be applied.

name: DiscountCodeBasicInput
description: Specifies input field to create or update code basic discount.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: The title of the discount.

inputFields.name: startsAt
inputFields.description: The date and time when the discount starts.

inputFields.name: endsAt
inputFields.description: The date and time when the discount ends. For open-ended discounts, use `null`.

inputFields.name: usageLimit
inputFields.description: The maximum number of times that the code discount can be used. For open-ended discounts, use `null`.

inputFields.name: appliesOncePerCustomer
inputFields.description: Whether the discount can be applied only once per customer.

inputFields.name: minimumRequirement
inputFields.description: The minimum subtotal or quantity that's required for the discount to be applied.

inputFields.name: customerGets
inputFields.description: The qualifying items in an order, the quantity of each one, and the total value of the discount.

inputFields.name: customerSelection
inputFields.description: The customers that can use the discount.

inputFields.name: code
inputFields.description: The code to use the discount.

name: DiscountCustomerSelectionInput
description: Specifies the customers who can use this discount.

inputFields.name: all
inputFields.description: Whether all customers can use this discount.

inputFields.name: customers
inputFields.description: The list of customer IDs to add or remove from the list of customers.

inputFields.name: customerSavedSearches
inputFields.description: The list of customer saved search IDs to add or remove from the list of customer saved searches.

name: DiscountCustomersInput
description: Specifies which customers to add to or remove from the discount.

inputFields.name: add
inputFields.description: A list of customers to add to the current list of customers who can use the discount.

inputFields.name: remove
inputFields.description: A list of customers to remove from the current list of customers who can use the discount.

name: DiscountCustomerSavedSearchesInput
description: Specifies which customer saved searches to add to or remove from the discount.

inputFields.name: add
inputFields.description: A list of customer saved searches to add to the current list of customer saved searches.

inputFields.name: remove
inputFields.description: A list of customer saved searches to remove from the current list of customer saved searches.

name: DiscountCodeBxgyInput
description: Specifies input field to create or update a BXGY code discount.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: The title of the discount.

inputFields.name: startsAt
inputFields.description: The date and time when the discount starts.

inputFields.name: endsAt
inputFields.description: The date and time when the discount ends. For open-ended discounts, use `null`.

inputFields.name: customerBuys
inputFields.description: The qualifying items and the quantity of each one that the customer has to buy to be eligible for the discount.

inputFields.name: customerGets
inputFields.description: The qualifying items in an order, the quantity of each one, and the total value of the discount.

inputFields.name: customerSelection
inputFields.description: The customers that can use this discount.

inputFields.name: code
inputFields.description: The code to use the discount.

inputFields.name: usageLimit
inputFields.description: The maximum number of times that the code discount can be used. For open-ended discounts, use `null`.

inputFields.name: usesPerOrderLimit
inputFields.description: The maximum number of times that the discount can be applied to an order.

inputFields.name: appliesOncePerCustomer
inputFields.description: Whether the discount can be applied only once per customer.

name: DiscountCodeFreeShippingInput
description: Specifies input field to create or update free shipping code discount.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: The title of the discount.

inputFields.name: startsAt
inputFields.description: The date and time when the discount starts.

inputFields.name: endsAt
inputFields.description: The date and time when the discount ends. For open-ended discounts, use `null`.

inputFields.name: code
inputFields.description: The code to use the discount.

inputFields.name: usageLimit
inputFields.description: The maximum number of times that the code discount can be used. For open-ended discounts, use `null`.

inputFields.name: appliesOncePerCustomer
inputFields.description: Whether the discount can be applied only once per customer.

inputFields.name: minimumRequirement
inputFields.description: The minimum subtotal or quantity that's required for the discount to be applied.

inputFields.name: customerSelection
inputFields.description: The customers that can use this discount.

inputFields.name: destination
inputFields.description: A list of destinations where the discount will apply.

name: DiscountShippingDestinationSelectionInput
description: Specifies the destinations where the free shipping discount will be applied.

inputFields.name: all
inputFields.description: Whether the discount code applies to all countries.

inputFields.name: countries
inputFields.description: A list of countries where the discount code will apply.

name: DiscountCountriesInput
description: Specifies a list of countries to add or remove from the free shipping discount.

inputFields.name: add
inputFields.description: The country codes to add to the list of countries where the discount applies.

inputFields.name: remove
inputFields.description: The country codes to remove from the list of countries where the discount applies.

inputFields.name: includeRestOfWorld
inputFields.description: Whether the discount code is applicable to countries that have not been defined in the shop's shipping zones.

name: DraftOrderInput
description: The input fields used to create or update a draft order.

inputFields.name: appliedDiscount
inputFields.description:
The discount that will be applied to the draft order.
A draft order line item can have one discount. A draft order can also have one order-level discount.

inputFields.name: billingAddress
inputFields.description: The mailing address associated with the payment method.

inputFields.name: customerId
inputFields.description: Customer associated with the draft order.

inputFields.name: customAttributes
inputFields.description: Extra information added to the customer.

inputFields.name: email
inputFields.description: The customer's email address.

inputFields.name: lineItems
inputFields.description:
Product variant line item or custom line item associated to the draft order.
Each draft order must include at least one line item.

inputFields.name: metafields
inputFields.description: Metafields attached to the draft order.

inputFields.name: privateMetafields
inputFields.description: The private metafields attached to the draft order.

inputFields.name: note
inputFields.description: The text of an optional note that a shop owner can attach to the draft order.

inputFields.name: shippingAddress
inputFields.description: The mailing address to where the order will be shipped.

inputFields.name: shippingLine
inputFields.description: A shipping line object, which details the shipping method used.

inputFields.name: tags
inputFields.description:
Additional short descriptors, commonly used for filtering and searching,
formatted as a string of comma-separated values.

inputFields.name: taxExempt
inputFields.description:
Whether or not taxes are exempt for the draft order.
If false, then Shopify will refer to the taxable field for each line item.
If a customer is applied to the draft order, then Shopify will use the customer's tax exempt field instead.

inputFields.name: useCustomerDefaultAddress
inputFields.description: Sent as part of a draft order object to load customer shipping information.

name: DraftOrderAppliedDiscountInput
description: The input fields for applying an order-level discount to a draft order.

inputFields.name: amount
inputFields.description: The applied amount of the discount.

inputFields.name: description
inputFields.description: Reason for the discount.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Title of the discount.

inputFields.name: value
inputFields.description:
The value of the discount.
If the type of the discount is fixed amount, then this is a fixed dollar amount.
If the type is percentage, then this is the percentage.

inputFields.name: valueType
inputFields.description: The type of discount.

name: DraftOrderLineItemInput
description: The input fields used to create a line item for a draft order.

inputFields.name: appliedDiscount
inputFields.description: Discount which will be applied to the line item.

inputFields.name: customAttributes
inputFields.description: Represents a generic custom attribute using a key value pair.

inputFields.name: grams
inputFields.description: Ignored when variant ID is provided. This argument is deprecated: Use `weight` instead.

inputFields.name: originalUnitPrice
inputFields.description: Ignored when variant ID is provided.

inputFields.name: quantity
inputFields.description: The number of products that were purchased.

inputFields.name: requiresShipping
inputFields.description: Ignored when variant ID is provided.

inputFields.name: sku
inputFields.description: Ignored when variant ID is provided.

inputFields.name: taxable
inputFields.description: Ignored when variant ID is provided.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Ignored when variant ID is provided.

inputFields.name: variantId
inputFields.description:
The ID of the product variant corresponding to the line item.
Null if custom line item. Required if product variant line item.

inputFields.name: weight
inputFields.description:
Specifies the weight unit and value inputs.
Ignored when variant ID or product ID are provided.

name: ShippingLineInput
description: Specifies the shipping details for the order.

inputFields.name: price
inputFields.description: Price of the shipping rate.

inputFields.name: shippingRateHandle
inputFields.description: A unique identifier for the shipping rate.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Title of the shipping rate.

name: DraftOrderDeleteInput
description: Specifies the draft order to delete by its ID.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The ID of the draft order to delete.

name: FulfillmentInput
description: The input fields used to create a fulfillment.

inputFields.name: orderId
inputFields.description: The ID of the order to be fulfilled.

inputFields.name: lineItems
inputFields.description: The line items to be fulfilled.

inputFields.name: trackingNumbers
inputFields.description: Tracking numbers associated with the fulfillment.

inputFields.name: trackingUrls
inputFields.description: The URLs to track the fulfillment.

inputFields.name: trackingCompany
inputFields.description: The name of the tracking company.

inputFields.name: notifyCustomer
inputFields.description:
Whether the customer is notified.
If set to true, a notification is sent when the fulfillment is created.

inputFields.name: shippingMethod
inputFields.description: A reference to the shipping method, such as `Free Shipping`.

inputFields.name: locationId
inputFields.description: The ID of the location from which the items will be fulfilled.

name: FulfillmentLineItemInput
description: The input fields used to include a line item from an order in a fulfillment.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The ID of the line item.

inputFields.name: quantity
inputFields.description: The quantity of the line item to be fulfilled.

name: TrackingInfoUpdateInput
description: Specifies all possible fields for updating tracking information.

inputFields.name: trackingDetails
inputFields.description: Tracking information consisting of one or more tracking URLs and numbers associated with the fulfillment.

inputFields.name: trackingCompany
inputFields.description: The name of the tracking company.

inputFields.name: notifyCustomer
inputFields.description: Indicates whether the customer will be notified of this update and future updates for this fulfillment.

name: TrackingInfoInput
description: Specifies the fields for tracking information.

inputFields.name: number
inputFields.description: The tracking number of the fulfillment.

inputFields.name: url
inputFields.description: The URL to track the fulfillment.

name: InventoryAdjustQuantityInput
description: Specifies the fields required to adjust the inventory quantity.

inputFields.name: inventoryLevelId
inputFields.description: ID of the inventory level to adjust.

inputFields.name: availableDelta
inputFields.description: Count by which to adjust the available quantity.

name: InventoryAdjustItemInput
description: Specifies the items and their adjustments.

inputFields.name: inventoryItemId
inputFields.description: ID of the inventory item to adjust.

inputFields.name: availableDelta
inputFields.description: Count by which to adjust the available quantity.

name: InventoryItemUpdateInput
description: Inventory items.

inputFields.name: cost
inputFields.description: Unit cost associated with the inventory item, the currency is the shop's default currency.

inputFields.name: tracked
inputFields.description: Whether the inventory item is tracked.

inputFields.name: countryCodeOfOrigin
inputFields.description: The ISO code of the country of origin.

inputFields.name: provinceCodeOfOrigin
inputFields.description: The ISO code of the province of origin.

inputFields.name: harmonizedSystemCode
inputFields.description: The harmonized system code of the inventory item.

inputFields.name: countryHarmonizedSystemCodes
inputFields.description: List of country-specific harmonized system codes.

name: CountryHarmonizedSystemCodeInput
description: Holds the country specific harmonized system code and the country ISO code.

inputFields.name: harmonizedSystemCode
inputFields.description: Country specific harmonized system code.

inputFields.name: countryCode
inputFields.description: Country ISO code.

name: MetafieldDeleteInput
description: Specifies the input fields to delete a metafield.

name: MarketingActivityUpdateInput
description: Specifies the input fields required to update a marketing activity.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The id for this marketing activity.

inputFields.name: marketingRecommendationId
inputFields.description: The ID of the recommendation this marketing activity was created from, if one exists.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: The title of this marketing activity.

inputFields.name: budget
inputFields.description: The budget for this marketing activity.

inputFields.name: adSpend
inputFields.description: The cumulative amount spent on this marketing activity. This argument is deprecated: Use `MarketingEngagementCreate.MarketingEngagementInput.adSpend` GraphQL to send the ad spend.

inputFields.name: status
inputFields.description: The current state of the marketing activity.

inputFields.name: utm
inputFields.description:
Specifies the
[Urchin Traffic Module (UTM) parameters](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UTM_parameters)
that are associated with a related marketing campaign. UTMInput is required for all Marketing
tactics except Storefront App. This utm param can be only set once and never modified.

inputFields.name: marketedResources
inputFields.description:
A list of the items that were marketed in this marketing activity. Valid types for these items are:
* `Product`
* `Shop` (Must be your current shop).

inputFields.name: context
inputFields.description: Encoded context provided by Shopify during the update marketing activity callback. This argument is deprecated: This context is no longer needed by Shopify in the callback.

inputFields.name: errors
inputFields.description: Error messages generated when app was trying to complete this activity.

name: MarketingActivityBudgetInput
description: This type combines budget amount and its marketing budget type.

inputFields.name: budgetType
inputFields.description: Budget type for marketing activity.

inputFields.name: total
inputFields.description: Amount of budget for the marketing activity.

name: UTMInput
description:
Specifies the
[Urchin Traffic Module (UTM) parameters](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UTM_parameters)
that are associated with a related marketing campaign.

inputFields.name: campaign
inputFields.description: The name of the UTM campaign.

inputFields.name: source
inputFields.description: The name of the website or application where the referral link exists.

inputFields.name: medium
inputFields.description: The UTM campaign medium.

name: MarketingEngagementInput
description: This object represents marketing engagement input fields for a marketing engagement.

inputFields.name: occurredOn
inputFields.description: The date that these engagements occurred on.

inputFields.name: impressionsCount
inputFields.description: The total number of impressions for the day.

inputFields.name: viewsCount
inputFields.description: The total number of views for the day.

inputFields.name: clicksCount
inputFields.description: The total number of clicks on the marketing event for the day.

inputFields.name: sharesCount
inputFields.description: The total number of shares for the day.

inputFields.name: favoritesCount
inputFields.description: The total number of favorites for the day.

inputFields.name: commentsCount
inputFields.description: The total number of comments for the day.

inputFields.name: unsubscribesCount
inputFields.description: The total number of unsubscribes for the day.

inputFields.name: complaintsCount
inputFields.description: The total number of complaints for the day.

inputFields.name: failsCount
inputFields.description: The total number of fails for the day.

inputFields.name: sendsCount
inputFields.description: The total number of sends for the day.

inputFields.name: uniqueViewsCount
inputFields.description: The total number of unique views for the day.

inputFields.name: uniqueClicksCount
inputFields.description: The total number of unique clicks for the day.

inputFields.name: adSpend
inputFields.description: The total ad spend for the day, if the marketing event is a paid ad with a daily spend.

inputFields.name: isCumulative
inputFields.description: Whether the engagements are reported as lifetime values rather than daily totals.

inputFields.name: utcOffset
inputFields.description: The UTC Offset that the app is using to determine which date to allocate spend to.

inputFields.name: fetchedAt
inputFields.description: The date time at which the data was fetched.

name: MetafieldStorefrontVisibilityInput
description: Specifies the input fields for a MetafieldStorefrontVisibilityInput.

inputFields.name: namespace
inputFields.description: The namespace of the metafield to be visible to the storefront api.

inputFields.name: key
inputFields.description: The key of the metafield to be visible to the storefront api.

inputFields.name: ownerType
inputFields.description: The core resource ( e.g.: Product ) that owns this metafield.

inputFields.name: enabled
inputFields.description: Whether the subscription is enabled.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: ID of the subscription.

name: OrderCaptureInput
description: Specifies the authorized transaction to capture and the total amount to capture from it.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The ID of the order to capture.

inputFields.name: parentTransactionId
inputFields.description: The ID of the authorized transaction to capture.

inputFields.name: amount
inputFields.description: The amount to capture.

inputFields.name: currency
inputFields.description: The currency (in ISO format) that is used to capture the order. This must be the presentment currency (the currency used by the customer) and is a required field for orders where the currency and presentment currency differ.

name: OrderCloseInput
description: Specifies an open order to close.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The ID of the order to close.

name: OrderMarkAsPaidInput
description: Specifies the order to mark as paid.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The ID of the order to mark as paid.

name: OrderOpenInput
description: Specifies a closed order to open.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The ID of the order to open.

name: OrderInput
description: Specifies the information to be updated on the requested order.

inputFields.name: email
inputFields.description: The email address associated with the order.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The ID of the order to update.

inputFields.name: note
inputFields.description: The order note.

inputFields.name: tags
inputFields.description: The order tags.

inputFields.name: shippingAddress
inputFields.description: The shipping address associated with the order.

inputFields.name: customAttributes
inputFields.description: Custom information to add to the order, represented as a key value pair. Also referred to as note attributes.

inputFields.name: metafields
inputFields.description: The metafields to associate with this order.

name: PriceRuleInput
description: Specifies the input fields to manipulate a price rule.

inputFields.name: validityPeriod
inputFields.description: PriceRuleValidityPeriod for the price rule.

inputFields.name: oncePerCustomer
inputFields.description: Whether the price rule can be applied only once per customer.

inputFields.name: customerSelection
inputFields.description: A selection of customers for whom the price rule applies.

inputFields.name: usageLimit
inputFields.description: The maximum number of times the price rule can be applied.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Title of the price rule.

inputFields.name: allocationLimit
inputFields.description: The maximum number of times the price rule will be allocated onto an order.

inputFields.name: allocationMethod
inputFields.description: The method (each or across) by which the price rule's value is allocated to its entitled items.

inputFields.name: value
inputFields.description: The value of the price rule.

inputFields.name: target
inputFields.description: The type of lines (line_item or shipping_line) to which the price rule applies.

inputFields.name: prerequisiteSubtotalRange
inputFields.description: The sum of the entitled items subtotal prices must fall within this range for the price rule to be applicable.

inputFields.name: prerequisiteQuantityRange
inputFields.description: The number of the entitled items must fall within this range for the price rule to be applicable.

inputFields.name: prerequisiteShippingPriceRange
inputFields.description: The shipping cost must fall within this range for the price rule to be applicable.

inputFields.name: itemEntitlements
inputFields.description: The items to which the price rule applies.

inputFields.name: itemPrerequisites
inputFields.description: The items needed to apply the price rule.

inputFields.name: shippingEntitlements
inputFields.description: The shipping lines to which the price rule applies.

inputFields.name: entitlementToPrerequisiteQuantityRatio
inputFields.description: Quantity of prerequisite items required for the price rule to be applicable, compared to quantity of entitled items. This argument is deprecated: Use `prerequisiteToEntitlementQuantityRatio` instead.

inputFields.name: prerequisiteToEntitlementQuantityRatio
inputFields.description: Quantity of prerequisite items required for the price rule to be applicable, compared to quantity of entitled items.

name: PriceRuleValidityPeriodInput
description: Specifies the input fields to update the validity period of a price rule.

name: PriceRuleCustomerSelectionInput
description: Specifies the input fields to update a price rule customer selection.

inputFields.name: forAllCustomers
inputFields.description: Whether the price rule applies to all customers.

inputFields.name: savedSearchIds
inputFields.description: List of customer saved searches that contain the customers to whom the price rule applies. No single customer IDs may be present.

inputFields.name: customerIdsToAdd
inputFields.description: List of customers to add to the current list of customers to whom the price rule applies. `savedSearchIds` must be empty.

inputFields.name: customerIdsToRemove
inputFields.description: A list of customers to remove from the current list of customers to whom the price rule applies.

name: PriceRuleValueInput
description: Specifies the input fields to update a price rule.

inputFields.name: percentageValue
inputFields.description: The percentage value of the price rule.

inputFields.name: fixedAmountValue
inputFields.description: The fixed amount value of the price rule.

name: PriceRuleMoneyRangeInput
description: Specifies the input fields to update the money range within which the price rule is applicable.

inputFields.name: lessThan
inputFields.description: The upper bound of the money range.

inputFields.name: lessThanOrEqualTo
inputFields.description: The upper or equal bound of the money range.

inputFields.name: greaterThan
inputFields.description: The lower bound of the money range.

inputFields.name: greaterThanOrEqualTo
inputFields.description: The lower or equal bound of the money range.

name: PriceRuleQuantityRangeInput
description: Specifies the input fields to update the quantity range within which the price rule is applicable.

inputFields.name: lessThan
inputFields.description: The upper bound of the quantity range.

inputFields.name: lessThanOrEqualTo
inputFields.description: The upper or equal bound of the quantity range.

inputFields.name: greaterThan
inputFields.description: The lower bound of the quantity range.

inputFields.name: greaterThanOrEqualTo
inputFields.description: The lower or equal bound of the quantity range.

name: PriceRuleItemEntitlementsInput
description: Specifies the input fields to update a price rule line item entitlement.

inputFields.name: targetAllLineItems
inputFields.description: Whether the price rule applies to all items.

inputFields.name: productIds
inputFields.description: The products to which the price rule applies.

inputFields.name: productVariantIds
inputFields.description: The product variants to which the price rule applies.

inputFields.name: collectionIds
inputFields.description: The collections to which the price rule applies.

name: PriceRuleItemPrerequisitesInput
description: Specifies the input fields to update a price rule's item prerequisites.

inputFields.name: productIds
inputFields.description: The products needed for the price rule to be applied.

inputFields.name: productVariantIds
inputFields.description: The product variants needed for the price rule to be applied.

inputFields.name: collectionIds
inputFields.description: The collections needed for the price rule to be applied.

name: PriceRuleShippingEntitlementsInput
description: Specifies the input fields to update a price rule shipping entitlement.

inputFields.name: targetAllShippingLines
inputFields.description: Whether the price rule applies to all shipping lines.

inputFields.name: countryCodes
inputFields.description: The codes for the countries to which the price rule applies to.

inputFields.name: includeRestOfWorld
inputFields.description: Whether the price rule is applicable to countries that have not been defined in the shop's shipping zones.

name: PriceRuleEntitlementToPrerequisiteQuantityRatioInput
description: Specifies the quantity of prerequisite items required for the price rule to be applicable, compared to quantity of entitled items.

inputFields.name: entitlementQuantity
inputFields.description: The quantity of entitlements in the ratio.

inputFields.name: prerequisiteQuantity
inputFields.description: The quantity of prerequisites in the ratio.

name: PriceRulePrerequisiteToEntitlementQuantityRatioInput
description: Specifies the quantity of prerequisite items required for the price rule to be applicable, compared to quantity of entitled items.

inputFields.name: entitlementQuantity
inputFields.description: The quantity of entitlements in the ratio.

inputFields.name: prerequisiteQuantity
inputFields.description: The quantity of prerequisites in the ratio.

name: PriceRuleDiscountCodeInput
description: Specifies the input fields to manipulate a discount code.

inputFields.name: code
inputFields.description: The code of a discount.

name: ProductAppendImagesInput
description: Specifies product images to append.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The ID of the product.

inputFields.name: images
inputFields.description: The images to be appended to the product.

name: ProductInput
description: Specifies the input fields required to create a product.

inputFields.name: descriptionHtml
inputFields.description: The description of the product, complete with HTML formatting.

inputFields.name: handle
inputFields.description: A unique human-friendly string for the product. Automatically generated from the product's title.

inputFields.name: redirectNewHandle
inputFields.description:
Whether a redirect is required after a new handle has been provided.
If true, then the old handle is redirected to the new one automatically.

inputFields.name: seo
inputFields.description: The SEO information associated with the product.

inputFields.name: productType
inputFields.description: The product type specified by the merchant.

inputFields.name: tags
inputFields.description: A list of the tags that have been added to the product.

inputFields.name: templateSuffix
inputFields.description: The theme template used when viewing the product in a store.

inputFields.name: giftCard
inputFields.description: Whether the product is a gift card.

inputFields.name: giftCardTemplateSuffix
inputFields.description: The theme template used when viewing the gift card in a store.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: The title of the product.

inputFields.name: vendor
inputFields.description: The name of the product's vendor.

inputFields.name: bodyHtml
inputFields.description: A description of the product. Supports HTML formatting. This argument is deprecated: Use `descriptionHtml` instead.

inputFields.name: collectionsToJoin
inputFields.description: The IDs of the collections that this product will be added to.

inputFields.name: collectionsToLeave
inputFields.description: The IDs of collections that will no longer include the product.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Specifies the product to update or create a new product if absent.

inputFields.name: images
inputFields.description: The images to associate with the product.

inputFields.name: metafields
inputFields.description: The metafields to associate with this product.

inputFields.name: privateMetafields
inputFields.description: The private metafields to associated with this product.

inputFields.name: options
inputFields.description: List of custom product options (maximum of 3 per product).

inputFields.name: productPublications
inputFields.description: A list of the channels where the product is published. This argument is deprecated: Use `PublishablePublish` instead.

inputFields.name: publications
inputFields.description: A list of the channels where the product is published. This argument is deprecated: Use `PublishablePublish` instead.

inputFields.name: publishDate
inputFields.description: This argument is deprecated: Use `PublishablePublish` instead.

inputFields.name: publishOn
inputFields.description: This argument is deprecated: Use `PublishablePublish` instead.

inputFields.name: published
inputFields.description: This argument is deprecated: Use `PublishablePublish` instead.

inputFields.name: publishedAt
inputFields.description: This argument is deprecated: Use `PublishablePublish` instead.

inputFields.name: variants
inputFields.description: A list of variants associated with the product.

name: ProductPublicationInput
description: Specifies a publication to which a product will be published.

inputFields.name: publicationId
inputFields.description: ID of the publication.

inputFields.name: channelId
inputFields.description: ID of the channel. This argument is deprecated: Use publicationId instead.

inputFields.name: channelHandle
inputFields.description: This argument is deprecated: Use publicationId instead.

inputFields.name: publishDate
inputFields.description: The date and time that the product was (or will be) published.

name: ProductVariantInput
description: Specifies a product variant to create or update.

inputFields.name: barcode
inputFields.description: The value of the barcode associated with the product.

inputFields.name: compareAtPrice
inputFields.description: The compare-at price of the variant.

inputFields.name: fulfillmentServiceId
inputFields.description: The ID of the fulfillment service associated with the variant.

inputFields.name: harmonizedSystemCode
inputFields.description: The Harmonized System Code (or HS Tariff Code) for the variant.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Specifies the product variant to update or create a new variant if absent.

inputFields.name: imageId
inputFields.description: The ID of the image that's associated with the variant.

inputFields.name: imageSrc
inputFields.description: The URL of an image to associate with the variant.  This field can only be used through mutations that create product images and must match one of the URLs being created on the product.

inputFields.name: inventoryManagement
inputFields.description:
The fulfillment service that tracks the number of items in stock for the product variant. If you track the inventory yourself using the admin, then set the value to `shopify`. Valid values: `shopify` or the handle of a fulfillment service that has inventory management enabled.
 This argument is deprecated: Use tracked attribute on `inventoryItem` instead.

inputFields.name: inventoryPolicy
inputFields.description: Whether customers are allowed to place an order for the product variant when it's out of stock.

inputFields.name: inventoryQuantities
inputFields.description: Create only field. The inventory quantities at each location where the variant is stocked.

inputFields.name: inventoryItem
inputFields.description: Inventory Item associated with the variant, used for unit cost.

inputFields.name: metafields
inputFields.description: Additional customizable information about the product variant.

inputFields.name: privateMetafields
inputFields.description: The private metafields to associated with this product.

inputFields.name: options
inputFields.description: The custom properties that a shop owner uses to define product variants.

inputFields.name: position
inputFields.description: The order of the product variant in the list of product variants. The first position in the list is 1.

inputFields.name: price
inputFields.description: The price of the variant.

inputFields.name: productId
inputFields.description: Create only required field. Specifies the product on which to create the variant.

inputFields.name: requiresShipping
inputFields.description: Whether the variant requires shipping.

inputFields.name: sku
inputFields.description: The SKU for the variant.

inputFields.name: taxable
inputFields.description: Whether the variant is taxable.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: This argument is deprecated: Variant title is not a writable field; it is generated from the selected variant options.

inputFields.name: taxCode
inputFields.description: The tax code associated with the variant.

inputFields.name: weight
inputFields.description: The weight of the variant.

inputFields.name: weightUnit
inputFields.description: The unit of weight that's used to measure the variant.

name: InventoryLevelInput
description: Inventory quantity at a specific location.

inputFields.name: availableQuantity
inputFields.description: Sets the quantity available at the location.

inputFields.name: locationId
inputFields.description: ID of the location.

name: InventoryItemInput
description: Inventory items.

inputFields.name: cost
inputFields.description: Unit cost associated with the inventory item, the currency is the shop's default currency.

inputFields.name: tracked
inputFields.description: Whether the inventory item is tracked.

name: ProductDeleteInput
description: Specifies the product to delete.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The ID of the product.

name: ProductPublishInput
description: Specifies a product to publish and the channels to publish it to.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The product to create or update publications for.

inputFields.name: productPublications
inputFields.description: The publication that the product is published to.

name: PublicationInput
description: Specifies the input fields required to publish a resource.

inputFields.name: channelId
inputFields.description: ID of the channel. This argument is deprecated: Use publicationId instead.

inputFields.name: publicationId
inputFields.description: ID of the publication.

inputFields.name: publishDate
inputFields.description: The date and time that the product was (or will be) published.

name: SavedSearchCreateInput
description: Specifies the fields required to create a saved search.

inputFields.name: resourceType
inputFields.description: The type of resouce this saved search is searching in.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: A descriptive name of the saved search.

inputFields.name: query
inputFields.description: The query string of a saved search. This includes search terms and filters.

name: SavedSearchDeleteInput
description: Specifies the fields to delete a saved search.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: ID of the saved search to delete.

name: SavedSearchUpdateInput
description: Specifies the fields required to update a saved search.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: ID of the saved search to update.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: A descriptive name of the saved search.

inputFields.name: query
inputFields.description: The query string of a saved search. This included search terms and filters.

name: ProductUnpublishInput
description: Specifies a product to unpublish from a channel and the sales channels to unpublish it from.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The ID of the product to create or update publications for.

inputFields.name: productPublications
inputFields.description: The channels to unpublish the product from.

name: PrivateMetafieldDeleteInput
description: Specifies the input fields for a PrivateMetafield.

inputFields.name: owner
inputFields.description: The ID of the owning resource.

inputFields.name: namespace
inputFields.description: The namespace for the private metafield.

inputFields.name: key
inputFields.description: The key for the private metafield.

name: RefundInput
description: Specifies the fields to create a refund.

inputFields.name: currency
inputFields.description: The currency (in ISO format) that is used to refund the order. This must be the presentment currency (the currency used by the customer) and is a required field for orders where the currency and presentment currency differ.

inputFields.name: orderId
inputFields.description: Order ID for which the refund is created.

inputFields.name: note
inputFields.description: An optional note attached to a refund.

inputFields.name: notify
inputFields.description: Whether to send a refund notification to the customer.

inputFields.name: shipping
inputFields.description: Specifies how much of the shipping cost to refund.

inputFields.name: refundLineItems
inputFields.description: A list of line items to refund.

inputFields.name: transactions
inputFields.description: A list of transactions involved in the refund.

name: ScriptTagInput
description: Specifies the input fields for a script tag.

inputFields.name: src
inputFields.description: The URL of the remote script.

inputFields.name: displayScope
inputFields.description: The page or pages on the online store where the script should be included.

name: ShopLocaleInput
description: Specifies the input fields for a shop locale.

inputFields.name: published
inputFields.description: Specifies the publication state of the locale.

name: StaffMemberInviteInput
description: The input fields used to invite a staff member.

inputFields.name: email
inputFields.description: The staff member's email address.

inputFields.name: firstName
inputFields.description: The staff member's first name.

inputFields.name: lastName
inputFields.description: The staff member's last name.

inputFields.name: permissions
inputFields.description: The staff member's access permissions for the Shopify admin.

name: StaffMemberInput
description: The input fields used to update a staff member.

inputFields.name: email
inputFields.description: The staff member's email address.

inputFields.name: firstName
inputFields.description: The staff member's first name.

inputFields.name: lastName
inputFields.description: The staff member's last name.

inputFields.name: permissions
inputFields.description: The staff member's access permissions for the Shopify admin.

inputFields.name: httpMethod
inputFields.description: HTTP method to be used by the Staged Upload.

name: StageImageInput
description: Image to be uploaded.

inputFields.name: resource
inputFields.description: Image resource.

inputFields.name: filename
inputFields.description: Image filename.

inputFields.name: mimeType
inputFields.description: Image MIME type.

inputFields.name: httpMethod
inputFields.description: HTTP method to be used by the Staged Upload.

name: StorefrontAccessTokenInput
description: Specifies the input fields for a storefront access token.

name: StorefrontAccessTokenDeleteInput
description: Specifies the input fields to delete a storefront access token.

name: AttachmentInput
description: Specifies the input fields for an attachment.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: ID of the attachment.

inputFields.name: url
inputFields.description: The URL of the attachment. Must be a signed upload URL.

name: TranslationInput
description: Provides the fields and values to use when creating or updating a translation.

inputFields.name: locale
inputFields.description: The locale of the translation.

inputFields.name: key
inputFields.description: The key of the translation.

inputFields.name: value
inputFields.description: The value of the translation.

inputFields.name: translatableContentDigest
inputFields.description: The digest (hash) of the content being translated.

name: WebhookSubscriptionInput
description: Specifies the input fields for a webhook subscription.

inputFields.name: callbackUrl
inputFields.description: URL where the webhook subscription should send the POST request when the event occurs.

inputFields.name: format
inputFields.description: The format in which the webhook subscription should send the data.

inputFields.name: includeFields
inputFields.description: The list of fields to be included in the webhook subscription.

inputFields.name: metafieldNamespaces
inputFields.description: The list of namespaces for any metafields that should be included in the webhook subscription.
